description:
Original release date: 8/27/2009

(Itch build has been altered and recompiled to run on modern operating systems.)

Ime, a humanoid computer, suddenly finds herself among the ranks of a local honeypot, a network devoted to attracting and trapping viruses, without any explanation. To make matters even more complicated, there's been rumors of a mysterious virus by the name of "<3", that is said to be able to create the illusion of romantic love. It's a wild romp as some try to uncover its secrets, some to help cure it, and some just to see its effects through until the end!
